title: Lindsay Lohan Trapped by Tabloids and Lawsuits?
description:
Lindsay Lohan went from being a celebrated childhood star and teen idol to being chased down by paparazzi and ridiculed by the tabloids for her drug and alcohol issues. Tune in as we cover the tumultuous ups and downs of Lindsay Lohan’s professional and personal life, including several lawsuits along the way.

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LegallyJudgy
